text:
Had multiple unpleasant experiences with the same young female staff that others have mentioned in their reviews. Even when the flavour I wanted was clearly still available, she tried to persuade me to mix flavours and even lectured me with, “Don’t ask so much, it’s already on discount.”

Honestly, I’d much rather spend my money elsewhere than be told how to spend it by someone with such a poor attitude. This isn’t free, and I’m certainly not a beggar—I’m a paying customer, not here for a lecture or bad service! Discount or not, no one deserves to be treated this way. Plenty of other outlets offer better food and far better service. This one’s officially off my list!
bought 6 pieces of takoyaki and one of them had hair inside. bloody disgusting pls dont buy from here

The tokoyaki tasted floury, and more like a bread ball and not much food in it. I ordered 15 pieces and gave me heaps of sauce and toppings which is I'm happy about it. The sauce taste not too bad though but the tokoyaki itself doesn't taste like typical Japanese tokoyaki. Haven't finish all my 15 balls the 2 bites is just enough to put in the bin. The staff she is not too bad though,unfortunately the food are. They don't accept card, cash only.

02/05 around 1p-2p very bad experience! When I see the menu 10+2 is $8.20 ,but ended in the lady change me $10.80?? I choice 6pcs prawn and 6pcs octopus,so she said not under family set 10+2 ???  Terrible and the staff very rude !!!!

on 11 January At 4:50pm I bought 12 Takoyaki at bugis mall basement  , it so dry and hard how could something so tough to eat still be sold?!  I had to throw alway Takoyaki is waste my $8.30 because of how difficult it was to eat
